title: Crash after pick Champion
body:
Hi everyone,

I have a problem; i don't know but when I try to start a game after pick champions my game crash and say me : "Whoops! Something broke. powered by bugsplat". 

I have try all this operations but it doesn't work  :
 - Send Error Report
 - Download Again the game
 - Disable my firewal and antivirus
 - Set on compatibility Windows 7 and launch in administrator
 - Disable Game Bar with Xbox Windows 10 Application
 - Try the old client and the new client

My Computer run Windows 10 Pro and it is a Asus ROG g751JL.

What I can do  to solve the problem ?

Regards

Mirardes

PS : I see this in Configuration file LeagueClientSettings.yaml when i try to launch :
> 
    gameflow-process-info:
        pid: 3916
        rawArgs:
        - "8394"
        - "DefinitelyNotLeagueClient.exe"
        - "/this/path/is/bogus/but/the/game/doesnt/care"
        - "162.249.77.40 5105 HqRFUt0+z7rFUgJOHTD0LA== 94640126"

replies.body:
This specific error message (Bugsplat) typically occurs if there are certain issues with your system's drivers or your hardware. These issues can typically be resolved by working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it covers the steps we've seen frequently fix this error.

Let me know if this caused any noticeable change to your Bugsplats.

I am also having a very similar issue. 

Specific Problem: After champion select (on any game mode), the timer counts down to zero and the game tries to switch from the launcher to the game. It crashes and gives me a bug splat error. It puts me back to the launcher with the reconnect button. When I press reconnect, it does the exact same thing with the same bugsplat.

Things I have tried: 
- Clean windows boot 
- older graphic card drivers 
- updating DirectX 
- update Java 
- compatibility mode 
- run as administrator 
- turning off firewall 
- turning off anti-virus 
- uninstalling/reinstalling LoL and cleaning the registry 
- repairing LoL through launcher

None of these things in any combination seem to get me into a game. I have leaverbuster now from the ARAM games I was trying to play, so I switched to custom games to try and troubleshoot but still not luck. Any advice would be appreciated. I'm at my wits end here.

EDIT/UPDATE This worked for me: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
